title: WEDNESDAY 2/3 - Tom Brady without Bill Belichick
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 2/3 - Tom Brady without Bill Belichick
description:
Tom Brady making his 10th Super Bowl appearance, but the first without Bill Belichick. Hear what TB-12 has to say about his former head coach (0:36). Chiefs defensive coordinator Steve Spagnuolo knows a thing or two about stopping Brady (1:33) and Patrick Mahomes talks about his dynamic 1-2 punch in Tyreek Hill and Travis Kelce (2:25). In non-Super Bowl news, Tom Pelissero has the lastest on Matt Ryan's future in Atlanta (3;16)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
